attributes.action: give equality to common land owners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Property owner's who own land/property with common parts to it such as residents car parking, common close etc are not protected by Law. Should strangers keep using the car park or the close as a short cut then under current law the police are unable to stop them, and neither are we.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
